sig_info: While Phased take no damage from any source.
While Phased gain 90 to 200.05% Defensive Combat Power Rate and pause Phasing while being struck.

The first time each Personal Incinerate effect expires naturally or is Purified, it has a 10 to 30% chance to retrigger itself at +30% potency. Incinerates triggered from this ability are always Passive.

PASSIVE: Immune to Incinerate, thanks to Lockheed’s assistance.
PASSIVE PROWESS - MAX 20: Gain 1 Prowess each time either champion lands a Critical Hit or Inflicts a Stun effect. +2 against Guaranteed Crits or Passive Stuns.
Gain 2 Prowess when intercepting a Dashing Opponent.
Each Prowess increases Special Attack Damage by 5% and lasts until the end of Kitty’s next Special Attack that strikes the Opponent or their Block.
If Kitty is inflicted with Cowardice, all Prowess are lost.
While the Opponent is suffering from Incinerate, Prowess potency begins to increase by up to 400% over 40 seconds. This bonus gradually falls off while no Incinerates are active.
Each time Lockheed prevents an Incinerate, the above Prowess Potency bonus is increased by 30%. Cooldown 0.8 seconds.
When throwing a Special Attack, all personal Prowess are removed and reapplied through the current Prowess Potency bonus.
PHASING: Dashing forward with 3 or more Prowess triggers Phasing for the duration of the dash plus 1.20 second(s) after, giving the Opponent a 100% chance to Miss. This is paused during Kitty’s Special Attacks.
While Phased gain +2971.43 Critical Rating, become Stun Immune and take 80% reduced damage.
While Phased #Robots suffer -20% Ability Accuracy reduction.
Personal Debuffs and Buffs that are triggered while Phased become Passive and gain +20% duration.
Each Miss caused by Phase deals a burst of 86.45 Physical Damage and Kitty gains +3 Personal Prowess, these can stack above the normal limit.
When Phasing expires, 6 Prowess are consumed for each Miss that Phasing caused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The final 3 hits in this attack each inflict an Incinerate Debuff dealing 33.67 Energy Damage over 3.50 seconds, reducing block proficiency by 50% and removing Perfect Block chance.
Incinerates inflicted by this attack expire 1 at a time and are paused and refreshed while any other Incinerate is active.
With 10+ Prowess, Incinerates will trigger through block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of Physical Damage equal to 40% of the damage dealt by the hit.
With 10+ Prowess, gain an Unblockable Buff lasting 9 seconds, plus an additional 0.25 seconds for each Prowess above 10.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a non-stacking Incinerate Debuff dealing 81.9 Energy Damage over 30 seconds.
When this attack ends, enter Phasing for 2 seconds, if Phasing was already active this time extends to 4 seconds.

sig_info: While Phased take no damage from any source.

While the Opponent is suffering from Incinerate, Prowess potency begins to increase by up to 400% over 40 seconds. This bonus gradually falls off while no Incinerates are active.
Each time Lockheed prevents an Incinerate, the above Prowess Potency bonus is increased by 30%. Cooldown 0.8 seconds.
When throwing a Special Attack, all personal Prowess are removed and reapplied through the current Prowess Potency bonus.
PHASING: Dashing forward with 3 or more Prowess triggers Phasing for the duration of the dash plus 1.20 second(s) after, giving the Opponent a 100% chance to Miss. This is paused during Kitty’s Special Attacks.
While Phased gain +3714.29 Critical Rating, become Stun Immune and take 80% reduced damage.
While Phased #Robots suffer -20% Ability Accuracy reduction.
Personal Debuffs and Buffs that are triggered while Phased become Passive and gain +20% duration.
Each Miss caused by Phase deals a burst of 1208.4 Physical Damage and Kitty gains +3 Personal Prowess, these can stack above the normal limit.
When Phasing expires, 6 Prowess are consumed for each Miss that Phasing caused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The final 3 hits in this attack each inflict an Incinerate Debuff dealing 470.64 Energy Damage over 3.50 seconds, reducing block proficiency by 50% and removing Perfect Block chance.
Incinerates inflicted by this attack expire 1 at a time and are paused and refreshed while any other Incinerate is active.
With 10+ Prowess, Incinerates will trigger through block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of Physical Damage equal to 40% of the damage dealt by the hit.
With 10+ Prowess, gain an Unblockable Buff lasting 9 seconds, plus an additional 0.25 seconds for each Prowess above 10.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a non-stacking Incinerate Debuff dealing 1144.8 Energy Damage over 30 seconds.
When this attack ends, enter Phasing for 2 seconds, if Phasing was already active this time extends to 4 seconds.

sig_info: While Phased take no damage from any source.
While Phased gain 102.75 to 250% Defensive Combat Power Rate and pause Phasing while being struck.

Incinerates inflicted by this attack expire 1 at a time and are paused and refreshed while any other Incinerate is active.
With 10+ Prowess, Incinerates will trigger through block.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of Physical Damage equal to 40% of the damage dealt by the hit.
With 10+ Prowess, gain an Unblockable Buff lasting 9 seconds, plus an additional 0.25 seconds for each Prowess above 10.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a non-stacking Incinerate Debuff dealing 89.1 Energy Damage over 30 seconds.
When this attack ends, enter Phasing for 2 seconds, if Phasing was already active this time extends to 4 seconds.
